Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a red pottery wine-jar, interior grooved and exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior specifying the contents as year 8 western river wine.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389869) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389869)
